snippet: The International Olympic Committee revoked the Olympic qualifying status of a shooting championship in Kuwait after an Israeli official was denied a visa.
abstract: International Olympic Committee revokes qualifying status of Kuwait shooting championship after Israeli official Yair Davidovich is denied visa to enter country for event.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee revoked the Olympic qualifying status of a shooting championship in Kuwait after an Israeli official was denied a visa.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Olympics; Shooting Competition Decertified
